title: [1.8]【Parkour|跑酷】Mystical Chamber | 神秘的房间
author: scorpio975
txt_content:
本帖最后由 scorpio975 于 2015-7-13 10:51 编辑 


大家好 我是scorpio975
这是我的第6次搬运，希望大家支持一下
都连着三次是跑酷了，下次搬建筑！





                                                        ———TrueSquid (minecraftforum)


[magenta_wool]地图介绍|Introduction[magenta_wool]

这张地图只能单人游玩！

“什么……我在哪儿？这是什么地方？不，这不会发生。
我以前经历过，请再没有。我请求你....请不要寄回给我。”

“你不该有一个选择！欢迎来到Mystical Chamber（神秘的房间）”


Mystical Chamber是一个有趣且富有挑战性的跑酷地图。
你必须通过20个阶段，通过完成水平你会得到更接近击败你的敌人。
在你游玩时房间会不断改变。
你能完成地图，显示你的敌人吗?



[lime_wool]视频实况|Video[lime_wool]【YouTube / 优酷】

YouTube频道 https://youtu.be/gVuF5xsuTyw

[cyan_wool]更新记录|Updates[cyan_wool]
【英语】

- Added voices to story (sounds).
- Re-designed end room.
- Added tip(s) on how to defeat the end boss.
- Added redstone tour
- Added difficulty selection (hard/normal)
- Bug fixes
- Added credits to spawn
- Fixed hard mode spawn bug
- Better respawn system (You no longer have to click respawn !)
- Fixed the scoreboard "TP" bug
- Added 4 new gamemodes to the map
-Added redstone tour
-Added difficulty selection (4 new game modes)
-Bug fixes
-Added credits to spawn
-- Retry button for the custom game modes
-- Back to spawn button for the custom game modes
-- The XP now displays your deaths, you can still use the tab list to see your deaths tho :)
-- Fixed XP bar bug
- Fixed hole in wall at end scene



[lightgrey_wool]作者原文|Original Text[lightgrey_wool]

THIS MAP IS SINGLE PLAYER ONLY !

"What... where am i. What is this place. No, this is not happening. I experienced it before, please not again. I beg you.... Please dont send me back there"

"You dont have a choice !
Welcome to THE MYSTICAL CHAMBER"

The Mystical Chamber is a fun and challenging parkour map. There are 20 stages you have to beat. By completing levels you will get closer and closer to defeating your enemy. The chamber changes as you progress through the map. Can you complete the map, and reveal your enemy ?

Please post any feedback/bugs in the comments :)


Updates :
- Added voices to story (sounds).
- Re-designed end room.
- Added tip(s) on how to defeat the end boss.
- Added redstone tour
- Added difficulty selection (hard/normal)
- Bug fixes
- Added credits to spawn
- Fixed hard mode spawn bug
- Better respawn system (You no longer have to click respawn !)
- Fixed the scoreboard "TP" bug
- Added 4 new gamemodes to the map
-Added redstone tour
-Added difficulty selection (4 new game modes)
-Bug fixes
-Added credits to spawn
-- Retry button for the custom game modes
-- Back to spawn button for the custom game modes
-- The XP now displays your deaths, you can still use the tab list to see your deaths tho :)
-- Fixed XP bar bug
- Fixed hole in wall at end scene

If nothing happens when you join the world (you are not getting teleported to spawn) follow this tutorial : (make sure you are not playing on a server, but on singleplayer. The map doesnt support multiplayer/servers)





END

搬运也不容易，求人气和金粒

尊重作者，请尽量到更多信息中下载
下载地址：http://pan.baidu.com/s/1jGs1DJ4
